recipe.title: Low-Carb Avocado Chicken Salad Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ⅔ cup ; greek yogurt, plain ; (190 g)

steps.step: In a blender or food processor, combine the yogurt, lime juice, pepper, and chili powder and pulse to combine. Add ½ of the avocado and blend until creamy.
In a medium bowl, combine the chicken, yogurt sauce, celery, the remaining ½ avocado, onion, and salt. Mix until well combined.
Serve on low-carb bread and garnish with cilantro, or as desired.
